channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Divine Child Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite the litany of the Divine Child Jesus from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Scripture And Tradition With Fr. Mitch Pacwa
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch examines (Proto) Isaiah, chapters 21 and 22, the visions of catastrophe they describe, and the meanings behind these visions. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Grandparents
channel.desc: Fr. James explores how a grandparent?s faith can be a powerful influence on their grandchildren, especially in circumstances where they don?t live in practicing households. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc: Mother Seraphina Marie, FDM, talks about her reversion to the Catholic Faith. Hosted by Marcus Grodi. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Women Of Grace
channel.desc: The consecration to Our Lady profoundly shaped the spiritual life and pontificate of St. John Paul II. Monsignor Arthur Calkins shares his unique insight on its history, from the early days of the Church to the present. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! First Papal Audience With Pope Leo Xiv
channel.desc: Live from the Vatican, Pope Leo XIV delivers his weekly address to the faithful in what will be his first public address as Pope since his election. (75 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Gospel Glimpses
channel.desc: Unlike scholars who often contradict each other, the best explainers of Scripture are the saints. Today, discover why we must pay attention to them, because they?re dauntless in their faith and truly love the church. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Living Divine Mercy
channel.desc: Fr. Chris Alar, M.I.C. helps viewers get a better understanding of the Divine Mercy message, and shares powerful, real life examples of people who live Divine Mercy in their every day lives. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Get A Life In Christ
channel.desc: Fr, Benedict is developing the theme over several episodes of the gift of the virtues being powers afforded us from God. This episode is devoted to his discussion of "Whatever Happened to Virtue?" It is no longer politically correct to be virtuous and, of course, Fr. Benedict takes exception to that position. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Father Leo Clifford develops the idea that our deepest yearnings are put there by God due to His great love for us. He wants us to learn to love Him as much as He love us, impossible though that may be. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Vaticano
channel.desc: We reflect on our new Pope?s challenges. Discover the Church's role during World War II. Hear from Cardinal Czerny on the Conclave. Explore the Caravaggio exhibition. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Jeanne Jugan: Yesterday And Today
channel.desc: A look at the life and ministry of the Little Sisters of the Poor, founded by Jeanne Jugan with a special mission of hospitality, particularly towards the elderly. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Roamin? Catholic
channel.desc: As Rob prepares and attempts to leave for back to back trips, he and Pete realize the meaning of being a good host and a good houseguest, just as Mary was to her cousin Elizabeth. (30 minutes).
